content: FYI : The IG template I used to create US-Core, DAF -Research and Argonaut Guides has been updated to include simple breadcrumbs . It also lists a bunch of available Jekyll variables for the site and the structuredefinitions which I thought might be helpful.
This is great @Eric Haas , thank you for putting this together!
NP the breadcrumbs are super simple and rely on liquid tagging not Jquery. so don't go very deep. but trying to keep it simple.
